title: Downpour
description: A little sister lost.A family tree withered. A journey to save the past. Max Valentine is a walking supernova.On the run and searching for answers, his light darkens. Dark skies on the horizon make his next chapter ominous. His powers are fading but still he pushes toward the storm. Embers still burn but can he survive this one truth......love is eternal but the heart is not.
author: Madison Daniel
